definition: to imagine the wildest thing/to indulge in fantasy
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: " The Fantasticks" has only 8 actors. There are only 2 musicians.
sentences.chinese: “异想天开”只有8个演员和2名伴奏人员。

sentences.english: It suddenly occurred to the bird that it was the most fantastic idea for birds to catch up with man.
sentences.chinese: 它恍然明白，鸟意欲赶追人类是多么异想天开。

sentences.english: Is this a fact-based forecast or wishful thinking?
sentences.chinese: 这是基于事实的展望或异想天开？

sentences.english: Not all stories are so whimsical.
sentences.chinese: 当然，并非所有的故事都是如此的异想天开。

sentences.english: I wanted it to feel punchy and whimsical.
sentences.chinese: 我想让她的房间看起来强大的且异想天开的。

sentences.english: Bourdon is so eager to get back to the stage he is literally dreaming about it.
sentences.chinese: 弹簧是如此渴望回到舞台上，他简直是异想天开。

sentences.english: 20 years ago, Internet popularization by the human was also thought is indulges in fantasy.
sentences.chinese: 20年前，互联网的普及还被人认为是异想天开。

sentences.english: At first blush Mr Nasheed's notion seems a bit over the top.
sentences.chinese: 乍一听，纳希德总统的想法似乎有点异想天开。

sentences.english: Is it the skyscraper of the future, or just a pie-in-the-sky idea?
sentences.chinese: 这是未来的摩天大楼，还是一个异想天开的想法？

sentences.english: This bob is best for that whimsical and soft look.
sentences.chinese: 这款发型适合异想天开的温柔的人群。

sentences.english: Dog people are horrified at the very idea of choosing a moggy (cat) instead of a pooch (dog).
sentences.chinese: 而爱狗的人一听养猫这个异想天开的主意就吓一跳。

sentences.english: It was a wild idea at the time. Few people understood it.
sentences.chinese: 这在当时是一个异想天开的设想，几乎无人理解。

sentences.english: He's always got his head in the clouds-he makes all these impossible plans.
sentences.chinese: 他总爱异想天开，拟出全部这些做不到的方案。

sentences.english: If is to have fantastic idea, only with one chamber youth red-blooded that is very not enough.
sentences.chinese: 如果是异想天开，仅凭一腔青年热血那是很不够的。

definition: to daydream/to indulge in wishful thinking
like a heavenly steed, soaring across the skies (idiom)/(of writing, calligraphy etc) bold and imaginative/unconstrained in style
to be carried away by one's wishful thinking (idiom)/to labor under a delusion/wishful thinking
